>
[Earthsense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2572) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to earth and stone allows you to feel the slightest displacement that disturbs them, down to the shift of a pebble. You gain [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.
